Translations.Text: Ayen aabde$, kunwi ur t taabdem
Nek, ur d aabad n ayen taabdem
Ayen aabde$, kunwi ur t taabdem
Nekkini, s ddin inu, kunwi s ddin nnwen
Ma iusa d l$elb n Oebbi, akked rrbee
D$a twalav imdanen keccmen ddin n Oebbi, d igrawen
Sbuccaa s ccekoan Mass ik, ssuter aS ssmae. Neppa Izga Issuruf
A nnger ifassen n Abulahab, u a nnegr is
Iwumi yas wayla s, akked wayen ikseb
Ad ioe$ di tmessi m ujajie
akked tmeiiut is, i ipbibbin as$ao
